values.description: This indicator computes the Triple Exponential Moving Average (TEMA). The Triple Exponential Moving Average is calculated with the following formula: EMA1 = EMA(t,period) EMA2 = EMA(EMA(t,period),period) EMA3 = EMA(EMA(EMA(t,period),period),period) TEMA = 3 * EMA1 - 3 * EMA2 + EMA3
